name: Little Smith
description:
Little Smith is a casual simulation game with story.

Game is still in early state and some features are still missing. Saving will be included in next version of the game(demo isn't that long).

Player is beginner smith who inherited forge in far town from his uncle. Player goal is to create prospering forge an reveal mystery of uncle unexpected journey to the Empire.

- Craft multiple items from different categories

- Upgrade your forge and character

- Get to know NPCs and build relations with them

- Take part in events

- Multiple different taks

- Take part in Guild meetings
